title: Mask Rage, Space The Final Funktier 6.30.20
itunes:title: Mask Rage, Space The Final Funktier 6.30.20
description:
In episode 662, Jack and guest host Scam Goddess Laci Mosley are joined by comedian and Facial Recognition Comedy's Fizaa Dosani to discuss Trump tweeting out racist videos, Americans refusing to wear masks, Trump's Russia problem, what space smells like, the new MAGA social media app, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Trump Retweets Racist Video Showing Supporter Yelling ‘White Power’
  2. Why do so many Americans refuse to wear face masks? Politics is part of it — but only part
  3. The Condoms of the Face: Why Some Men Refuse to Wear Masks
  4. Timeline: What we know about Russia’s bounties on U.S. troops — and Trump’s response
  5. This is what space smells like
  6. Trump fans are flocking to the social media app Parler — its CEO is begging liberals to join them
  7. Parler, the MAGA sect's new favorite social media app, is a nightmare
  8. Social Media App Parler Releases ‘Declaration Of Internet Independence’ Amidst #Twexit Campaign
  9. The Right’s New Favorite Social Media Platform Parler Is Just as Restrictive as Twitter
  10. WATCH: Guapdad 4000 - "Lil Scammer That Could" (feat. Denzel Curry) [Official Video]

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
